purpleculture_pinyin:
qiào
high and steep; precipitous; severe or stern
высокие и крутые; обрывистый; суровый или суровый
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 肖 indicates the sound; 山 (mountain) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
陡峭 [ dǒu qiào ]: precipitous
峭壁 [ qiào bì ]: cliff; steep; precipice
料峭 [ liào qiào ]: spring chill in the air; cold
峻峭 [ jùn qiào ]: high and steep
悬崖峭壁 [ xuán yá qiào bì ]: sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 山 [ shān ] mountain, hill, peak
    • 肖 [ xiào ] to resemble, to look like; to be like
heisig_chinese_memo: Candles are placed at all of the precipitous points of the mountain.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Candles are placed at all of the precipitous points of the mountain.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Mountain " to " Shaw " sound. The original meaning is that the mountain is steep, like a knife, and it is also called " que ." "Guang Yun. "Laughing Rhyme": "Que, the mountains are steep, but also cliffs." Such as "Chu Ci. Chapter Nine. "Sorrowful Return to the Wind": "The cliffs on the high rock are on the cliffs, and the mark of the females is upside down." Wang Yi's note: "Cliffs, the rocks are steep." "Han Feizi. "Five beetles": "Therefore, in the city of ten ren, Lou Ji is able to overtake those who can be surpassed." Lou Ji was a person who was good at jumping during the Warring States period. The whole sentence means ten thousand high city walls. Lou Ji cannot cross it. Because it is very steep.

" Qiao " is an extension to mean high mountains and rocks. For example, Song Fuliang of the Southern Dynasty "Yan Shen Lun": "The husband wields the blade according to the picture, but the foolish husband does not do it; Lin Yuan climbs the cliff, and it is not afraid." Wang Anshi of the Northern Song Dynasty "Wang Wang's Snow Picture": "I want to have a quiet life, alone Lin Qingqiao leans against the long pine."

" Qiao " means severe and harsh. Such as "Han Feizi. "Five beetles": "Therefore, the Ming masters abide by the laws and severely penalize them." "Huainanzi. "Qi Su": "Therefore, although the law is severe and the punishment is severe, it cannot be forbidden.

" Qiao " describes the writing is strange, dangerous and refined. Such as "Lun Heng. "Zi Ji": "The language is sweet and gentle, and the meaning is shallow." Wang Anshi of the Northern Song Dynasty "Send Shen Boyun": "Mostly, the sentence is not charming, the bones are old and hard without skin."

" Qiao " later expressed urgency and sharpness. "Zhengzitong. "Mountain": "Cliff, urgent." For example, Meng Jiao of the Tang Dynasty "Qiuhuai": "The cold dew drops and the dreams are broken, and the breeze combs the bones." It also means cold. For example, Zhou Bangyan of the Northern Song Dynasty "The Red Forest Captures Nearly": "Muxue helps to clear the cliff, and the jade dust is scattered in the forest pond."
humanum_short_description_en: From " mountain " to " xiao " sound. The original meaning is that the mountain is steep, like a knife, and it is also called " que ."
humanum_full_description:
從「山」，「肖」聲。本義是山勢險峻，像刀削一樣，又作「陗」。《廣韻．笑韻》：「陗，山峻，亦作峭。」如《楚辭．九章．悲回風》：「上高巖之峭岸兮，處雌蜺之標顛。」王逸注：「峭，山石之峻峭也。」《韓非子．五蠹》：「故十仞之城，樓季弗能踰者，峭也。」樓季是戰國時魏國善於騰跳之人，全句意謂十仞高的城牆，樓季不能越過是因為它很陡直。

　　「峭」引申表示高峻的山石。如南朝宋傅亮〈演慎論〉：「夫據圖揮刃，愚夫不為；臨淵登峭，莫不惴慄。」北宋王安石〈觀王氏雪圖〉：「想有幽人遺世事，獨臨青峭倚長松。」

　　「峭」表示嚴峻、苛刻。如《韓非子．五蠹》：「故明主峭其法而嚴其刑也。」《淮南子．齊俗》：「故雖峭法嚴刑，不能禁其姦。」

　　「峭」形容文筆奇險、脫俗。如《論衡．自紀》：「語甘文峭，務意淺小。」北宋王安石〈寄慎伯筠〉：「多為峭句不姿媚，天骨老硬無皮膚。」

　　「峭」後來又表示急、尖利。《正字通．山部》：「峭，急也。」如唐代孟郊〈秋懷〉：「冷露滴夢破，峭風梳骨寒。」亦表示寒冷。如北宋周邦彥〈紅林擒近〉：「暮雪助清峭，玉塵散林塘。」
humanum_short_description: 從「山」，「肖」聲。本義是山勢險峻，像刀削一樣，又作「陗」。

English Definition: high and steep; precipitous; severe or stern
Total strokes: 10; Radical: 山
Pictophonetic: 肖 indicates the sound; 山 (mountain) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 山 [ shān ] mountain, hill, peak
    • 肖 [ xiào ] to resemble, to look like; to be like

峭字的基本解释

峭
qiào
山又高又陡：陡峭。峭壁。峻峭。峭立。峭丽（a.陡峭而多姿；b.文辞遒劲华美）。峭拔。
形容严峻：峭寒。峭急。峭劲。峭厉。

峭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiào］
［《廣韻》七肖切，去笑，清。］
亦作“陗1”。
(1)陡直，高峻。
(2)陡峻的山。
(3)严峻，苛刻。
(4)尖利。
(5)形容诗文立意或遣词造句奇险、挺秀。
(6)俊俏。

峭字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峭； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页311第23
【廣韻】【集韻】?七肖切，音俏。山峻拔峭絕也。【集韻】嶮也。【淮南子·繆稱訓】岸峭者必阤。又【謝靈運·過始寧墅詩】巖峭嶺稠疊。　又急也，嚴厲也。【前漢·鼂錯傳】錯爲人峭直刻深。　【正字通】通作陗。

峭字的源字形

峭字的起名意思

：指严峻、陡直、挺拔、高超不凡。

Precipitous
Basic explanation of words
Precipitous
qiào
The mountain is high and steep: steep. cliff. Steep. Standing sharply. Qiao Li (a. Steep and colorful; b. The words are powerful and beautiful). Qiaoba.
Describe severe: Qiaohan. Precipitously. Qiaojin. Qiao Li.
Precipitous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiào］
["Guang Yun" Qi Xiao cut, laugh, clear. ]
Also known as "Qui 1".
(1) Steep and steep.
(2) Steep mountains.
(3) Severe and harsh.
(4) Sharp.
(5) Describe the idea of the poem or use the words to make the sentence strange, dangerous and pretty.
(6) Handsome.

Also 【Xie Lingyun·Cross Ningshu Poem】The rock cliffs are densely stacked.　It's also urgent and severe. [The wrong biography of the former Han·鼂] The mistake is straightforward.　【Zhengzitong】Tong Zuowei.

Source glyph
Precipitous
Name meaning
: Refers to stern, steep, upright, and superb.
峭
形声字。山表意,其形像陡峭的山峰;肖(xiao )表声,肖是削的省文,表示山陡峻如刀削。本义是高陡、险峻。
D山又高又陡:~壁」~立」陡~。②严厉;严峻:~直1

qiào
峭峭
Лихорадочный
Пиктофонетические символы.
Гора означает, что ее изображение напоминает крутую гору; Сяо (сяо) выражает звук, Сяо - это провинциальный язык для резки, что означает, что гора крута, как нож.
Первоначальное значение круто и круто.
Гора D высокая и крутая: ~ Стена "~ Стойка" крутая ~.
② Тяжелая; Тяжелая: ~ Прямая 1
Джун ~ "Холодно ~.
~ Поднимитесь вверх ~ стена крутая и холодная ~ крутой ~ материал ~ обрыв ~ стена
Лихорадочный
qiào
прил./наречие
1) отвесный, крутой (о горах)
这座山头太峭 эта вершина слишком крута
峭立 круто возвышаться
2) быстрый, резкий; вспыльчивый; крутой (о характере)
峭正 резкий и прямой
